column5: Spent a beautiful rainy night on my favorite tail off 9pm-11pm fishing from shore on the St. Mary's. Got a nice atlantic near late dusk on a wally diver Then a fiesty 19 inch eye. Here is my artsy memory of the night.
Things got fuzzy and things got blurry... then everything was gone!
Makes it worth being there. Thats right in the tailrace isn't it?  Oh yeah...pretty cool hooking up and not knowing if its gonna be an Atlantic, a Walleye, a whitefish, or who knows what else
